commitmentDescription: When I develop an additional feature for a web application, I spend a lot of time testing it and refactoring the code to avoid errors and ensure proper performance.
teamworkDescription: I see the opportunity to help my colleagues when they struggle with a technical issue, attend daily meetings with active participation, and adapt to the teamâ€™s workflow to ensure everything goes well.
innovationDescription: I look for ways to efficiently manage my time and resources to complete a critical module before the deadline, ensuring its proper functioning and adequate documentation.
responsibilityDescription: I effectively organize my time and resources to finish the implementation of a crucial part before the deadline, ensuring its proper functioning and documentation.
adaptabilityDescription: I quickly adjust to a change in project direction, learning and using a new programming language required by the client to meet updated project requirements.
missionDescription: Create innovative and efficient technological solutions that meet the business needs of the company.
visionDescription: To be a leader in the field of software engineering, with effective communication with a dynamic and innovative team within the company, making a significant impact on the development and success of future projects.
antiHeroDescription: Full-Stack software developer with a backend focus, using technologies like React, Bootstrap, .NET, Java, and Spring Boot. Additionally, I have experience handling relational (SQL) and non-relational (NoSQL) databases, which allows me to produce comprehensive and efficient software solutions.
appSicaDescription: Web application for asset control, allowing to register and manage the current and historical status of a company's assets. Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and MongoDB.
petIncDescription: Web application for Pet Inc that automates reservation management, monitors environmental conditions for pets, and provides real-time information to owners. Implemented HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, C#, SQL Server, and JQuery.
secureProyectFrontEndDescription: Frontend for a password management application, providing an intuitive user experience.
secureProyectBackEndDescription: Backend logic for a password generation and storage application, integrated with a non-relational database on Azure.
qtvDatabaseDescription: Database supporting QTV application functionalities, allowing content playback, download, and search by title, genre, and year.
ventiladorAutomaticoDescription: Connecting two IdeaBoard cards to automate room ventilation. Uses sensors and servomotors to maintain a cool environment.
